plurals.name: viewAllXRounds
plurals.comment:
viewAllXRounds [one] [other]
%s is the number of rounds in the Swiss tournament.
plurals.item: Féach ar na %s bhabhta go léir
Féach ar na %s mbabhta go léir
Féach ar na %s babhta go léir
Féach ar na %s babhta go léir

resources.string: Ligeann corr-líon babhtaí an chothromaíocht dathanna is fearr.

string.name: roundInterval
string.comment:
roundInterval
Specifically a time interval (e.g. 5 minutes) between rounds in a Swiss tournament

string.name: forbiddenPairings
string.comment:
forbiddenPairings
This option disallows pairing certain players.

resources.string: Ainmneacha úsáideora na n-imreoirí nach gcaithfidh imirt le chéile (Siblíní, mar shampla). Dhá ainm úsáideora in aghaidh an líne, scartha le spás.

string.name: newSwiss
string.comment:
newSwiss
Appears on a button: clicking this lets you create a new tournament in the Swiss format.
